snippet: Mike Trout doubled twice and drove in four runs as the Los Angeles Angels beat the Texas Rangers 10-7 Sunday and took a five-game winning streak into the All-Star break....

headline.print_headline: Trout 4 RBIs, Angels Beat Texas for 5th Win in Row
headline.main: Trout 4 RBIs, Angels Beat Texas for 5th Win in Row

lead_paragraph: Mike Trout doubled twice and drove in four runs as the Los Angeles Angels beat the Texas Rangers 10-7 Sunday and took a five-game winning streak into the All-Star break.
